titleStmt.title: Institutiones piæ or directions to pray also a short exposition of the Lords Prayer the Creed the 10 Com[m]andements Seauen Penitentiall Psalmes and Seauen Psalmes of thanksgiuing. by HI.
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
Isaacson, Henry, 1581-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Felix Kingston] for Henry Seile,

notesStmt.note: H.I. = Henry Isaacson, the editor; in fact by Lancelot Andrewes.
Subsequently published under Andrewes's name as: Holy devotions.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
